definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: She had a quarrel with the pimp and she went alone to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 在死之前，她和老鴇吵了一架，後隻身到了香港。

sentences.english: Although pimps are thugs, they do not rely solely on violence.
sentences.chinese: 雖然老鴇並非善類，但她們也不只依賴暴力。

sentences.english: Indeed, why not the patrons and the pimps?
sentences.chinese: 說真的，爲什麼老鴇和皮條客沒有遊街呢？

sentences.english: The madam was arrested for having underage girls working for her.
sentences.chinese: 這個老鴇因其手下有未成年少女而被捕。

sentences.english: Bessie died, she had a quarrel with the pimp and she want alone to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 在死之前，她和老鴇吵了一架，後隻身到了香港。

definition: to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to turn red (in the face)/to flush (with embarrassment or anger)
to stomp or hop about (in anxiety, anger etc)/to dance on one's feet/hopping mad (anxious, etc)
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
gnashing one's teeth (idiom); displaying extreme anger/fuming with rage between gritted teeth
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
